title: Seche Base Ridge Filling Base Coat .5 oz. [Health and Beauty]
description: Seche Base Ridge Filling Base Coat contains micro-fine crystals and natural clays to fill in ridges leaving nails with a glass-smooth appearance. These natural ingredients are suspended in powerful bonding agents to grip your nail color and are just viscous enough to make Seche Base Ridge Filling Base Coat is easy to apply. It's a standard base coat dries to a hard durable, slightly shimmering finish. It's an excellent foundation for Seche Vite to anchor onto.

title: OPI Lacquer Thinner, 2 Fluid Ounce
description: Extend the life of your favorite nail polishes with this nail lacquer thinner. Formulated with a carefully selected blend of solvents to rejuvenate overworked polish and maintain proper nail lacquer consistency. Specialized dropper bottle is ideal for careful, drop-by-drop application. May also be used to clean OPI Nail Lacquer brushes.

title: IBD Lavender Nail Cuticle Oil for Post Gel Treatment 0.5 oz ! special
description: IBD Lavender Nail Cuticle Oil for Post Gel Treatment 0.5 oz ! special
